channel.title: lisp on gingerBill
channel.description: Recent content in lisp on gingerBill

item.title: Multiple Return Values Research
item.description: I have recently been thinking about multiple return values as a concept, and wondering if there has been any kind of literature into the topic of “true” multiple return values which are not emulated through tuples. My current working hypothesis is that I think I have come to the conclusion (unless there is evidence to the contrary) Odin has invented a new kind of type system, something to the akin of polyadic expressions.
